rukus.text: Zai jiyang shang, an la shi nimen zhong yibufen ren chaoyue ling yibufen ren, jiyang youhou zhe jue bu yuan ba ziji de jiyang rang ji ziji de nupu, cong'er tamen zai jiyang shang yu ziji pingdeng. Nandao tamen fouren an la de enhui ma
An la yi nimen de tonglei zuo nimen de qizi, bing wei nimen cong qizi chuangzao ersun. An la hai yi jiamei de shiwu gongji nimen. Nandao tamen xinyang xuwang, er gufu zhu en ma
Tamen she an la er chongbai (ouxiang), na shi buneng wei tamen zhuchi cong tianshang jiangxia de he cong dishang shengchu de yidian jiyang de, erqie hao wu nengli de
Nimen buyao wei an la da biyu. An la zhidao, er nimen bu zhidao

An la da yige biyu: Yige nuli, buneng ziyou chuli renhe shiwu; yige ziyou ren, wo shangci ta youhou de jiyang, er ta mimi de he gongkai di jiayi shishe; ta lia ren shi yiyang de ma? Yiqie zansong, quan gui an la! Dan tamen daban bu zhidao

An la you da yige biyu: Liang ge nanren, yige shi yaba, shenme shi ye buneng zuo, que shi ta zhuren de leizhui, wulun zhuren dafa ta dao nali qu, dou buneng dai yidian fuli huilai; ling yige zou de shi zhenglu, ta quan ren zhuchi gongdao. Ta lia ren shi yiyang de ma
